document.full_text: brent seabrook and marian hossa each had a goal and an assist to help the chicago blackhawks beat the detroit red wings 4-2 on friday night.
document.title: seabrook, hossa lead blackhawks past red wings
lines_and_colors: brent seabrook and marian hossa each had a goal and an assist to help the chicago blackhawks beat the detroit red wings 4-2 on friday night.
